title: La La Land's Emma Stone delivers a touching BAFTA acceptance speech after Leading Actress win
text:
Tonight's BAFTA Film Awards were full of emotional and rousing speeches , so when the time came for Emma Stone to pick up the award for Leading Actress, it was only fitting the La La Land star would follow suit. It's the third major award the actress has picked up for the role this year (she has also won a Golden Globe and an SAG award for her efforts), and it's fair to say Emma was a little teary.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below So teary, in fact, that she stumbled over her words in an inspiring speech that referenced everything from troubled times to climate change.
"This is an unbelievable hono r," she said. "Thank you, BAFTA.
Getty "One of the greatest parts about tonight is sitting with all of these incredible people that made this film. We became such a family.
